title: Leauge Bar on the right and clubs not showing
body: [](https://p6.zdusercontent.com/attachment/43400/yVHAp2TPFSMZEIPp762E7PWNS?token=eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMTI4Q0JDLUhTMjU2In0..wV7NRFKkDRxKjJHQY7g1MQ.1wZo3s8bUadF-JayEBdLDvPzCKe_qDjNOQEDNK7noahtuhX65FQJF-Qlmt7ZQMfF6Vn8k4vRORApEwdjtYT4p7y2J_NAsbPKcLkzQLU7INIG6T012XVYV0AZOZPiv9a0JVmJQZuITNfDN2JWdcDi-evnX81msgWVihFB7sStMhpUORdMYXuQ_nN2wn2WHr4fXRR_0gEkEEfZYyKrUtEAvN_PtTXq68qC3nBtWWLR2yqXl7rmdKJXibA6dwaz8XkRR6y-HtekwIj_QzikHsy9ar2KnmUdaV2LYMb8hZFZPM0.cZF-rFv5ZPIXVuFQjsNisw)Everytime I log into league, everything is normal but I cant see my notification bar on the right or my clubs on the bottom. I also cant start a game.

replies.body: Do you also receive an error on the bottom of the client trying to connect to pvp.net?  Would you happen to have a screenshot?  It sounds like you might be having a network problem, but there may be other factors as well.  Let me know!
I actually reinstalled my league and it works now. Thanks for the help anyway though!
